Safety & Care

Q) Are the Pillows Waterproof?

Our pillows are not waterproof. We provide our pillows with two layers of premium cover to protect the inner foam. We prescribe that you take care to guard the Pillows from water or any fluid spills. It is also recommended to use the pillow covers provided with the bedsheet, it would add further protection to the Pillows.

Q) How do I clean my Pillows?

We spend around 7-8 hours sleeping on our pillows, so it is highly recommended to take care of the hygiene of the Pillow. We should always use the Pillow covers provided with the bedsheet and that should be washed every 7 Days. You can also remove the outer cover of the Pillow and spot clean the cover with mild detergent, Use a soft, damp and clean cloth using small circular motions to clean. Remember to dry the cover before putting it back on the pillow. Please Do not Machine wash the cover. For the Pillows you can keep it in the open air/ Sun to remove any smell if present. 

Popular Questions

Q) I’ve just received my Rise & Shine Pillow. How do I unpack it?

Congratulations for your new Pillow! Please follow the steps to easily unpack your pillow.

Step 1: Carefully tear the plastic

Step 2: Unroll the pillow

Step 3: Watch in amazement as your Pillow magically expands!

Step 4: Give it a maximum of 24 hours for it to take its original shape.

Step 5: Have a Good Night Sleep!

 

Q) Why is the Pillow priced low compared to other brands?

 You will be surprised to know that the price you pay at the retail store is actually 40% more than the manufacturing cost of the product. As you are directly purchasing from the manufacturers, the involvement of Distributors and Retailers aren’t there. Also we ship to you directly, further reducing the cost. 

 

Q) Are all of your products available online?

We carry the full line of products on our website. If you’re looking for something and can’t find it on our website, Please Contact our Sleep Experts.

 

Q) What if I have questions about your products?

We’re happy to answer your questions. Please Contact our Sleep Experts.

 

Q) What is the Density of Rise & Shine Pillows?

The Density of all our Pillows are 50±5 kg/m3. 

 

Q) What is Aero Technology?

Sync into the aero comfort to allow your pillow to have the maximum ventilation of air with the pin core technology so that the temperature of the pillow is regulated while you sleep. It helps reduce the heat and gives you a cooler experience. The pads have Pinholes to make the pillow breathable.  

 

Q) Will it take time to get adjusted to the new pillow?

Most likely you’ve been using a different (non Memory Foam /Latex Feel Foam) Pillows all your life and are using a Memory foam and Laytex Foam based Pillows for the first time. Your body needs time to adjust to a new type of pillow and this is why we request you to use the pillow for at least 3 weeks to give your body enough time to adjust to the Pillow.

 

 

Payment & Shipping

Q) Will the product get delivered to my location?

We deliver it across most of the cities within India. If you are still not sure and would like confirm before ordering, Please email your address with pin code at contact@riseandshineproducts.com

 

Q) How can I track my order?

You might want to know when your product is going to arrive on your doorstep. That’s why we send out an email notification the day your order is shipped with a confirmation of shipment and a tracking number. This gives you the ability to track your order at all times. Be sure to add contact@riseandshineproducts.com to your Email Address Book to ensure that our emails make it into your inbox.

 

Q) How do you pack the pillows?

Our pillows are vacuum pressed, sealed and then packed in stylish reusable carry bag. It is great fun unpacking your pillow, Watch in amazement as your Pillow magically expands!

 

Q) What are the delivery charges?

There are NO delivery charges for any of our Products. Even if you order a single pillow it will be delivered to you for free. 

 

Q) How much time does it take you to deliver?

Delivery times vary by pin code, but we mostly deliver to most places in India within 2 weeks. For more information about delivery times, please feel free to contact our support team at contact@riseandshineproducts.com

 

Q) Can I change the shipping address of the order?

You can change the shipping address before your order is shipped, by contacting us with your order reference number. Please email us at contact@riseandshineproducts.com

 

Q) What should I do if my order is received in a damaged condition?

If the parcel or the product is damaged or tampered with when you receive the parcel,  we request you to kindly not accept it and return it to the delivery man with all of the original packaging intact. You can call us or mail us at contact@riseandshineproducts.com mentioning your order reference number. We shall make our best efforts to ensure that a replacement delivery is made to you at the earliest.

 

Q) What kinds of Payment Methods do you accept?

We Accept Payment via Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking, UPI & Bank Deposits. We do not allow Cash on Delivery.

 

 

Product Specification

Q) What is Memory Comfort® Foam?

MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: Made up of imported materials these memory foam pillows bring you the most comfortable sleep. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-elastic memory foam.

 

Q) What is Laytex Comfort® Foam?

LAYTEX COMFORT® FOAM: If you prefer soft pillows then our Laytex Comfort® pillows are the perfect choice for you. Super Soft foam with latex feel is similar to natural rubber in terms of bounce and faster response time, the Pillow Remains cool because of the cooling technology which the pillow has. The Laytex Comfort® Foam also has few advantages over Natural Rubber like the pillows will never form knots, create lumps or collapse after sometime. 

 

Q) What is Gel Memory Comfort® Foam?

Rise & Shine Gel Memory Pillows have GEL Infused technology to keep the pillow cool while using. It maintains the temperature of the pillow by releasing the excessive heat generated by the human body during sleep. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-elastic memory foam.



Q) Are the chemicals used in the pillows safe?

All the Rise & Shine products are filler free foam made up of 100% MDI and are safe to be used.

 

Q) How Soft or Firm are the Pillows?

All our Pillows are made after research and customer feedback. We make our Products suitable to the widest range of customers. The Pillows offer the right kind of support with comfort.

Our Foam are of two different types and both offer slightly different firmness’s to match customer preference and expectation. On a scale of 1 [softest] – 10 [firmest]) we would rate the foam as:

Memory Comfort® & Gel Memory Foam: Our Memory Foam Pillows provides perfect back and posture support without compromising on comfort and coziness. We would rate it 8 on the firmness level.

Laytex Comfort®: Laytex Comfort foam is softer foam which provides a bounce and faster response time. This foam will be rated 6 on the firmness level.

 

 

For any other help, Please Contact our Sleep Experts. We’re happy to answer your questions.
